page.title: 04A RESIDENT OF MARSTON
page.content: Though born in Yorkshire Mrs. Slater has lived in Marston for many years. She first came to the village as a land girl during the second world war and stayed. At her wedding the reception was held in one of the school classrooms as there was no village hall at the time. Her husband has worked on a local farm for over 50 years. Mrs. Slater has been school caretaker for 34 years and has served under many different head masters. Both Mr. and Mrs. Slater retire this year and will visit their son and his family who have emigrated to Australia.
